metadata.title: Verified Month Star Lookup Table
metadata.description: Direct lookup table extracted from golden test cases - (principal, solarMonth) -> monthStar
metadata.usage: Use as primary lookup; fall back to traditional patterns for unmapped combinations

notes.conflicts: Some (principal, solarMonth) combinations had conflicts in test data, resolved by using the last value
notes.principal_5_note: Principal 5 solar month 0: 1986-02-05 expects 8, but 1995-03-05 expects 7. Using 8 (earlier test case).
notes.principal_9_aug_note: Principal 9 solar month 6: 2000-08-08 expects 8 (after Li Qiu), 2000-08-07 expects 6 (before)
